inclusion.criterion: Subjects eligible for Rebif therapy according to indications and clinical use in the
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who have read, understood, signed and dated the informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who are unable to fill in the questionnaires by him/herself
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have used disease modifying drugs within the last month (or 30 days)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has RRMS and is under treatment for 7 months. She smokes 10 cigarettes per day.
